known_issues: Deleting a card removes it from the card gallery temporarily, but the portfolio does not update; after page refresh the card reappears in the gallery (deletion not persisted / state sync issue between portfolio and gallery).

existing_features.title: Ensure the Portfolio UI updates immediately after a card is deleted from the gallery, using the same underlying data source as the gallery (React Query) and/or ensuring the portfolio snapshot query is reliably refetched/updated after deletion.

Fix gallery state synchronization so that the gallery reflects the backend as the source of truth after deletion, including correctly handling optimistic updates and ensuring the UI reconciles with the backend result.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix card deletion so that deleting a card is persisted in the backend and the deleted card does not reappear in the card gallery after a full page refresh.
